# Tex Shinobi ìš©

ðŸ”— [https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#](https://genesy.github.io/karabiner-complex-rules-generator/#)

```json
{
  "title": "Custom_IJKLUO",
  "rules": [
    {
      "description": "IJKL",
      "manipulators": [
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "i"
          },
          "to": [
            {
              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "up_arrow"
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "type": "basic",
          "from": {
            "modifiers": {
              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"
              ]
            },
            "key_code": "j"
          },
          "to": [

              "repeat": true,
              "key_code": "left_arrow"
            }
          ]

        {

          "from": {

              "mandatory": [
                "left_gui"

            },
            "key_code": "k"

    },

      "manipulators": [
        {

              "repeat": true,

                "left_gui"

    }

}
```

# T480 ìš©

```json
{
  "title": "T480_Custom_IJKLUO",
  "rules": [
    {
      "description": "T480_IJKL",
      "manipulators": [
        {
```

# HHKB PRO2 ìš© 

> ðŸ’¡ **ì¹´ë¼ë¹„ë„ˆ ë§ê³  ë”°ë¡œ ì“°ëŠ”ê²Œ ìžˆë‚˜ë´„**
> ðŸ”— [https://www.clien.net/service/board/cm_mac/17797232](https://www.clien.net/service/board/cm_mac/17797232)
>
> ì•„ëž˜ì²˜ëŸ¼ í•˜ì‹œë©´ CTRL+HJKLë¡œ ë°©í–¥í‚¤ ì´ë™ì´ ë  ê²ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë¸”ëŸ­ ì§€ì •, ë‹¨ì–´ ì´ë™ ê°™ì€ ì¶”ê°€ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë“¤ë„ SHIFT, ALT ì¶”ê°€ ì¡°í•©í•˜ë©´ ìž˜ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
>
> 1. Hammerspoon ì„¤ì¹˜
>
> - 
> [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/hammerspoon/releases/tag/0.9.97](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/hammerspoon/releases/tag/0.9.97)
>
> 2. Hammerspoon Preferences
>
> - Behavior
> - Launch Hammerspoon at login
> - Show menu icon
> - Accessibility
> - Accessibility is enabled. You're all set!
> - Enable Accessbility (ë…¹ìƒ‰)
> 3. Open Config (init.lua)
>
> 4. Reload Config
>
>
